title: Data Scientist
description: We are seeking an experienced Data Scientist with a minimum of 2 years of experience in data analysis and machine learning. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Python, R, and SQL, as well as experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. Knowledge of big data frameworks such as Hadoop or Spark is highly desirable. Educational requirements include at least a Bachelor's in Data Science, Statistics, or a related field, with a Master's or PhD preferred. Certifications such as 'AWS Certified Machine Learning' or 'Google Professional Data Engineer' are a plus.
